item.title: CVE-2024-29812|2024-03-27T12:09:33.434Z -- ReviewX -- ReviewX
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ReviewX allows Stored XSS.This issue affects ReviewX: from n/a through 1.6.22.
